feed.title: Budget Board Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budget Board: v2.3.1
entry.content:
Some small bug fixes and beginning to address some tech debt

What's Changed

  • Migrate dotnet to nowprovider by @teelur in https://github.com/teelur/budget-board/pull/473
  • Fix previous month copy by @teelur in https://github.com/teelur/budget-board/pull/474
  • Hide institutions with only hidden accounts by @teelur in https://github.com/teelur/budget-board/pull/476

Full Changelog: https://github.com/teelur/budget-board/compare/v2.3.0...v2.3.1

entry.title: New release for Budget Board: v2.3.2
entry.content:
Added some additional configuration options to the transaction CSV import.

  • Added a Date Format field to specify the format for your date column
  • Added an option to specify amount with separate Income and Expense columns
  • These values will be stored as a single Amount value when imported
  • Expense values will be negated (to indicate that the value is an outflow)

What's Changed

  • Add some options to CSV imports by @teelur in https://github.com/teelur/budget-board/pull/479

Full Changelog: https://github.com/teelur/budget-board/compare/v2.3.1...v2.3.2

entry.title: New release for Budget Board: v2.3.3
entry.content:
Adding some improved error handling and logging to make debugging weird issues a little easier.

What's Changed

  • Improve logging by @teelur in https://github.com/teelur/budget-board/pull/480

Full Changelog: https://github.com/teelur/budget-board/compare/v2.3.2...v2.3.3

entry.title: New release for Budget Board: v2.3.4
entry.content:
Fixed an issue where the server would throw a validation error when a number was passed in a field that expects a string. So far, I have only seen the issue when importing transactions with an account number in the Account field of the CSV.

What's Changed

  • Fix server side request string parsing by @teelur in https://github.com/teelur/budget-board/pull/481

Full Changelog: https://github.com/teelur/budget-board/compare/v2.3.3...v2.3.4

entry.title: New release for Budget Board: v2.3.5
entry.content:
Updated the return code for 2FA required to fix an issue with Apache2 reverse proxy.

What's Changed

  • Change 2fa required response by @teelur in https://github.com/teelur/budget-board/pull/482

Full Changelog: https://github.com/teelur/budget-board/compare/v2.3.4...v2.3.5
